Commands.Blood Weapon: 2-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Heals based on damage dealt up to 15% of Max HP.
Commands.Seize Attack+: 1-HIT BRV attack.  Grants Medium Max BRV Up for 3 turns.
Commands.Master of Arms: 3-HIT AoE BRV+HP attack.  100% HP damage dealt to all targets.  Turns to Master of Arms+ when HP ≥ 80% Max HP.
Commands.Master of Arms+: 3-HIT stronger AoE BRV+HP attack.  100% HP damage dealt to all targets.

Passives.Heal Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after HP Recovery.
Passives.Blood Weapon Power: Tremendously raises BRV damage dealt with Blood Weapon/+.
Passives.Attack Proficiency: Slightly raises Attack up to 10 times after every BRV attack.
Passives.Seize Attack Up: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Seize Attack/+.
Passives.HP Damage Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack after taking HP damage.
Passives.Blood Weapon Charge: Increases the max uses of Blood Weapon by 1.
Passives.Seize Attack Charge: Increases the max uses of Seize Attack by 1.
Passives.Where Wild Roses Bloom: Upon recovering HP, if the healing amount exceeds Max HP, the excess is converted to BRV.The BRV value granted is limited to 200% of Initial BRV.
Passives.HP Base&Boost All: Moderately raises party's Initial BRV and Max BRV when HP is over 50%.
Passives.Blood Weapon Extend: Increases Blood Weapon's max uses by 1.When using Blood Weapon:- Slightly raises its potency.- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150%.- Slightly raises the HP recovery limit.- Grants Blood Weapon for 6 turns.When HP is over 50% Max HP:- Turns Blood Weapon to Blood Weapon+.- Increases the number of hits to 4.- Slightly raises its potency.Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ and HP Attack to HP Attack+ while Blood Weapon is active and HP is over 50%.- BRV Attack+ is a 1-HIT BRV attack that raises party's BRV based on Attack and recovers HP based on damage dealt up to 5% Max HP.- HP Attack+ raises BRV based on Attack before inflicting an HP attack and recovers self HP based on damage dealt up to 5% Max HP.
Passives.HP Attack&Speed Up: Moderately raises Attack and Speed when HP is over 50%.
Passives.Seize Attack Extend: When using Seize Attack:- Moderately raises its potency.When using Seize Attack+:- Increases the number of hits to 3.- Slightly raises the total potency.- Slightly improves the effect of Max BRV Up.- Extends the duration of all buffs granted after using the ability by 2 turns.- Triggers an HP attack after use.Turns Seize Attack to Seize Attack+ (Blood Weapon) while Blood Weapon is active and HP is over 50% Max HP with the following effect:- Recovers HP based on damage dealt up to 15% Max HP.
